categories: Category:Plants of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: Torrent wisp trees were a species of tree native to Concordia, a moon of Mandalore in the Outer Rim Territories. The tree had a windswept appearance, its leaves facing in one direction and the trunk of the tree curved in the same direction. The trees had brown bark with green leaves and vines hanging from the leaves. The torrent wisp trees could be found in the countryside of Concordia, and lined paths through the region.

Torrent wisp trees first appeared, albeit unidentified, in "The Mandalore Plot," the twelfth episode of the second season of the animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars, which first aired on January 29, 2010. The trees were identified by name in the 2017 reference book Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia.
